LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ape.label: Ape
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ape.description: A prototype design which tested the feasibility of a large humanoid automatroid capable of equipping heavy weapons.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ape.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_HermitCrab.label: Hermit Crab
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_HermitCrab.description: These large, expensive, and heavy mobile industrial machines are designed to be an all-in-one unit for colonizing new worlds. Their large and expensive magnetic stabilized shells integrate many complex-axis CNC tools and precision machinery. In a pinch, its precision tools allow it to perform surgical procedures as long as the patient overcomes their fear of a machine weighing several tons acting as their surgeon.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_HermitCrab.tools.head.label: head
